Optional email

email: string

The email address.

Optional fullName

fullName: string

Inherited from UserObject.fullName

The full name of the user.

Optional groups

groups: Array<string>

Inherited from UserObject.groups

Groups

id

id: string

The UUID of the user.

Optional marketingAccepted

marketingAccepted: boolean

Inherited from UserObject.marketingAccepted

A flag indicating that receiving marketing information has been accepted.

Optional password

password: string

Inherited from UserObject.password

The password when creating a new user. It will be generated when not present in the request.

Optional phoneNumber

phoneNumber: string

Inherited from UserObject.phoneNumber

Phone number.

Optional termsAccepted

termsAccepted: boolean

Inherited from UserObject.termsAccepted

A flag indicating that the General Terms and Conditions has been accepted.

Optional username

username: string

Inherited from UserObject.username

A username containing alphanumerical letters and -,._@+= characters.
